Hi <@U7SL518D6>! I filled out the form to request beta access to GraphQL but thought Iâ€™d reach out here as well. We just added a HubSpot to MethodCRM Data Sync product to our catalog and it currently requires a massive amount of API requests to get all the data and relationships. Curious as to:

2. At what point could I start using this for a production environment?
